fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Regional Policy, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Task Force 50 and UK Withdrawal negotiations, Common Agricultural Policy, Trade policy, including free trade negotiations, import and export policy, Food standards and animal welfare policy, including official controls for food hygiene and animal health policies
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Union Européenne du Commerce du Bétail et des Métiers de la Viande (UECBV)  
British Meat Processors Association
goals__remit: NIMEA exists to represent the interests of the Northern Ireland Red Meat (beef & lamb) processing industry.  We aim to ensure that our members are aware of policy changes with regards to economic, trade, agriculture, food and environmental policies that have implications for the red meat industry.  We also seek to ensure that government at a local, national and EU level have an understanding of the implication of policy changes on our industry and where possible to contribute towards policy development.
